definition[0]: artificial hair that you wear on your head
definition[1]: an object covered with artificial hair that you wear on your head
example[0]: In England judges still have to wear wigs.
example[1]: Do you think it's real, or is it wig?
definition[2]: an area of artificial hair, used to cover a bald  part of your head
example[2]: The singer used to wear a toupée, and then decided to shave all his hair off.
definition[3]: a wig or a piece of false hair that you wear on your head to make your own hair look thicker
example[3]: Unfortunately the hairpiece didn't quite match the colour of her hair.
definition[4]: long pieces of artificial hair that can be attached to your hair to make it look longer
example[4]: I'm thinking of having extensions because my hair gets to a certain length and then becomes so thin that you can see through it.
